name: Twin Rhythm
description:
Twin Rhythm is a challenging arcade auto-runner with a focus on music. Stay alive and try to destroy blocks to get more points. When the music drops, prepare to play like a god. 

Warning: The game cointains flashing lights, as the visual effects are reacting to the beat. If you are prone to seizures or epilepsy, be cautious please.

Created by LindenHill Studios:

Philipp Ruf & Thomas Gessel

Made during a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 
with the theme: Stronger Together

Song: 

Track: Cream Blade - Heavenly (feat. Romi) [NCS Release]
Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds.
Watch: https://youtu.be/t4IOgVatNLI
Free Download / Stream: http://ncs.io/CBHeavenly

Controls: 

Left Ball (Blue): WASD

Right Ball (Pink): Arrow keys
